animeTitle: Ecchi na Shintai Sokutei Anime Edition
animeDescription: A teacher lucks out when he gets to supervise the body measuring sessions of his female fifth-grade students. While enjoying the wonders before his eyes, he notices that a particular student, Kanae Kouda, is absent. When she comes to school the next day, the teacher does his duty to get her measurementâ€”albeit in quite an eccentric manner.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
